Abstract: In this paper artificial intelligence and artificial neural networks introduced briefiy and
application areas of artificial intelligence on internet are mentioned. Information about APIs for
developing applications including artificial neural networks, is given. Using these technigues, a
tool for classifying web pages is developed.

algýlama, kavrama, yargýlama, sonuç çýkarma
yeteneklerinin tümüdür. Ayrýca; soyutlama, öð-
